actions.name: Honey Gather
actions.description: All valid creatures within 10m of the user have their EVA stage reduced by -1 for 2 activations. As a Downtime Action with a duration of 1 day, the user can explore and gather nectar from flowers in the area to create Honey. The user needs access to an Empty Bottle in order to perform this Downtime Action, or else the Honey is lost.
